interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Travel Friendly Face Cleanser, Quick Cleansing Dry Tissue 20 Packs - Dry Facial Wipes Makeup Remover Travel Size, Exfoliating Wipes For Face Review Date: 2020/10/04 Store: a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '20', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 2.76 x 3.94 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a solid five stars. I'm a flight attendant and it's such a pain to have to take a variety of products when you travel and some countries have liquid restrictions.

I used this as soon as I got to my hotel with low expectations that were quickly blown away. You use wet it with warm water and it takes off all makeup including mascara. You rinse with water afterwards but it's not overly soapy so you don't have to worry about getting soap in your eyes. I've used this at home and then used a cotton wool pad with my usual makeup remover expecting some residue makeup but nothing was left. I'm so impressed with these and as one pad will take off all your makeup it's really good value. Review Title: Sensational Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[Weekly Point Cosmetic Rose edition mask sheet] - Facial skin care mask sheet 3solutions(Wriklecare, Brighten up, Moisture) in one (1Pack of 10pcs) Weekly Point Cosmetic {'Brand': 'Weekly Point Cosmetic', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture,Skin', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 4.84 x 7.01 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} I’ve been using sheet masks for years. Long before they became something you could buy at your local pharmacy so I’m used to reading the adorable translations on the back (see photo)

That aside the mask is a little on the small side and I think I have an average sized face. It does stretch though and the benefit is that it doesn’t get in your hair. Lots of serum with this one, or mask juice as I like to call it
so at the end of the mask time you have enough to apply extra to your face a neck.

I left it for the full 20 minutes and my skin did feel soft and moisturised. I used it after a transatlantic flight and my skin really needed the hydration. Obviously you won’t see any miracles after one use but do make it part of your weekly or twice weekly routine for maximum effect.

Don’t be tempted to leave it on longer or sleep with it. All masks will just dry out and negate the benefits.

This is a nice addition to my sheet mask collection. Lovely and hydrating. Glass Nail File - JORLAI 2PC Nano Nail Shiner Nail Files Polisher Glass Nail Buffers Professional Crystal Manicure Tools Kit for Natural Nails JORLAI {'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '712322500167'} These are very cute and sparkly and come in their own case. I like that they’re nice and small and the thickness is great for shaping the sides of your nails. I found the buffing part slow going and it took quite a while to build up a shine but I’m happy with the end result. My nails took a real beating from gel so I’m giving them a break from all polish and this really helps build a lovely shine. Gives a good natural shine Travel Friendly Face Cleanser, Quick Cleansing Dry Tissue 20 Packs - Dry Facial Wipes Makeup Remover Travel Size, Exfoliating Wipes For Face a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '20', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 2.76 x 3.94 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} This is a solid five stars. I'm a flight attendant and it's such a pain to have to take a variety of products when you travel and some countries have liquid restrictions.

I used this as soon as I got to my hotel with low expectations that were quickly blown away. You use wet it with warm water and it takes off all makeup including mascara. You rinse with water afterwards but it's not overly soapy so you don't have to worry about getting soap in your eyes. I've used this at home and then used a cotton wool pad with my usual makeup remover expecting some residue makeup but nothing was left. I'm so impressed with these and as one pad will take off all your makeup it's really good value. Sensational
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Enthusiast:** The user is dedicated to skincare, particularly enjoying sheet masks and hydrating routines that nourish the skin.
- **Hydration Focus:** Prioritizes moisture and hydration, especially after travel, emphasizing a preference for restorative products.
- **Routine-Oriented:** Incorporates masks and other skincare elements into a consistent weekly or bi-weekly regimen for optimal results.
- **Quality Over Quantity:** Values sustainable, gradual results over quick fixes, showcasing patience in their skincare journey.
- **Sensory Preferences:** Appreciates pleasant scents and products that enhance the sensory experience while caring for the skin.
- **User-Friendly Products:** Prefers easy-to-use items that seamlessly integrate into their routine without inconvenience.
- **Value for Money:** Seeks products that deliver significant benefits, maximizing the effectiveness of each application.
- **Analytical Reviewer:** Engages in thoughtful feedback, analyzing product performance and sharing experiences with detailed reviews.
- **Nail Care Interest:** Has recently expanded into nail care, favoring tools that enhance the natural appearance of nails and cater to practical needs.
- **Travel Considerations:** Shows a keen interest in travel-friendly products that simplify routine management, especially in restrictive conditions, indicating a lifestyle that frequently involves travel.

Overall, this user prioritizes effective, hydrating skincare and maintains an organized routine while extending their grooming focus to nails and seeking convenient travel solutions.
